message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, and this price reflects the true value it holds.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I understand its value, but I am only able to pay up to $14,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I see you recognize the value of this product. While $20,000 represents my initial asking price, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this is a fair price that considers both of our positions.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering your latest offer, I would like to counter with $16,000. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
